SRP.Q: In the radar chart, what is the next dimension in the clockwise direction from Promotion Rate?
SRP.A: The next dimension clockwise from Promotion Rate is Pay Equity Ratio

SRP.Q: In the radar chart, what is the next dimension in the counterclockwise direction from Promotion Rate?
SRP.A: The next dimension counterclockwise from Promotion Rate is Offer Acceptance Rate.

SRP.Q: On the Offer Acceptance Rate, is the point for Ryan, Ewing and Boyd inside or outside the point for Haynes, Mosley and Ford?
SRP.A: On the Offer Acceptance Rate, the point for Ryan, Ewing and Boyd is outside the point for Haynes, Mosley and Ford.

VPR.Q: Which label encloses the largest score in the radar chart?
VPR.A: label {Pay Equity Ratio} encloses the largest score

VPR.Q: What are the strongest and weakest dimension of Haynes, Mosley and Ford?
VPR.A: The strongest aspect is {Pay Equity Ratio}, while the weakest aspect is{ Offer Acceptance Rate}.

VPR.Q: On dimension Skill Proficiency Rate, which label scores the highest?
VPR.A: On Skill Proficiency Rate, label {Haynes, Mosley and Ford} scores the highest.

VPR.Q: On dimension Skill Proficiency Rate, which label scores the highest?
VPR.A: On Skill Proficiency Rate, label {Haynes, Mosley and Ford} scores the lowest.

MSR.Q: For Ryan, Ewing and Boyd, based on the data shown in the radar chart, which dimension does it most need to improve?
MSR.A: Ryan, Ewing and Boyd most needs to improve its {Promotion Rate}.
